Hi @soumith @apaszke,
I have a use case where my training time is extremely large (About 5-6 days on a single gpu) and any increase in batch size would be extremely useful. I was checking through the docs for Pytorch 0.4.0 and this feature (Being able to access Embeddings with IntTensors still does not exist).
Is there a reason why it is not supported at the moment?

Thanks
